detail_desc: Short, straight-cut dress in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline, dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Unlined.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a deep neckline at the back that finishes in a knot detail at the hem. Ribbing around the neckline and armholes.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, buttons at the front and welt front pockets with a flap. Decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Hair elastics without metal clips.
Short top in soft jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a zip in one side and wide lace trim at the hem.

Shorter-style blouse in woven fabric with a small, gathered stand-up collar, an opening at the back and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons. Seam with wide, gathered ties at the hem that fasten at the back. Unlined.
Cardigan in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif and deep armholes with raw edges.

Calf-length dress in patterned silk with a round neckline, concealed zip down the front and yoke with a gathered seam at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Short dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a raw-edge hem. Brushed inside.

Knee-length dress in an airy weave with decorative pin-tucks, a V-neck, buttons at the top and short, wide sleeves. Seam at the waist with elastication at the back, a narrow, detachable tie belt and a softly draping skirt. Lined.
Slim-fit chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets and fake welt back pockets.

Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in wide-wale organic cotton corduroy. Straps with adjustable buttoning at the front, an open chest pocket and elastication at the back of the waist. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1-4Y) and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Hat in a soft, cable knit with a faux fur pompom on top and a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a kangaroo pocket and wrapover, jersey-lined hood with a decorative drawstring. Long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Necklace in different lengths of metal chain with a pendant. Adjustable length.
Top in soft, printed viscose jersey with short sleeves and ties at one side of the hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Parka in a woven modal blend with a soft, brushed finish. Hood, diagonal zip down the front, side pockets and a drawstring at the waist. Long sleeves with a tab and D-rings. Unlined.
Suede court shoes with covered heels. Leather linings and insoles. Heel 7.5 cm.

Short, padded jacket in woven fabric with a lacquered finish. Stand-up collar, zip down the front and front pockets with a concealed zip. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, and elastication and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Captain’s cap with a band at the front. Lined.
Elasticated satin scrunchie with a scarf detail.
Long, super-wide trousers in a softly draping weave with a glossy finish. High, elasticated waist, discreet side pockets and straight legs with creases.
Top in jersey made from a cotton blend. Lined hood with a wrapover front, ribbed side panels and a kangaroo pocket. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slim Fit.
Wide pyjama bottoms in an airy, patterned viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and wide, straight legs.

Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem. Relaxed Fit – a straight fit with good room for movement creating a comfortable, relaxed silhouette.
Long-sleeved top in soft, fine-knit cotton with a button placket, open chest pocket, contrasting colour elbow patches, roll-edge neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Knee-length skirt in a sturdy weave with a regular waist, decorative metal eyelets on the waistband, a concealed zip at the back and a sewn-in wrapover and slit at the front.
Sleeveless top in airy chiffon with a double-layered front with decorative studs, raw edges around the neckline and armholes and slits in the sides. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Derby shoes with a loop at the back and open lacing with waxed laces at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and fluted thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cropped jersey top in a printed cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a raw-edge hem.
Hat knitted in a soft cotton blend with faux fur pompoms on the top, a turned-up hem and earflaps with ties at the bottom. Fleece lining.
Short, V-neck dress in an airy viscose and linen weave with gathered shoulder seams, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in sweatshirt fabric made from organic cotton with a jersey-lined hood, buttons down the front and sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Short, sleeveless lace dress with a V-neck and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist with pleats, and a gently flared skirt. Jersey lining.
Long shirt woven in a cotton and linen blend with a collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Trousers in airy linen. Relaxed fit with a regular, elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets, a fake back pocket, and gently tapered legs.
Clamdiggers in washed cotton with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Slim-fit trousers in soft, stretch twill with a zip fly and button, a coin pocket, side pockets, back pockets and narrow hems.
Top in an airy rib knit with long sleeves and a tie detail at the hem.
Jersey hipster briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Striped satin tie. Width 6.5 cm.

Longer blouse in a woven blend containing some linen with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and flap chest pockets. Long raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Short jacket in soft faux fur with a hood, zip down the front with a ring pull and diagonal side pockets. Covered elastication at the cuffs and hem. Recycled polyester lining.

Two-button jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket with a lining that can be used as a decorative handkerchief, flap front pockets and two inner pockets, one with a button. One button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.

prod_name: All That Jazz Push Up Bra
detail_desc: Lined bikini top with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps that can be detached at the back, and a metal fastener at the back.
Calf-length skirt in a viscose weave with a wrapover front, concealed press-studs in the waistband and a tie belt at one side. Unlined.
Pull-on jeans in stretch, supersoft denim in a loose fit with an elasticated drawstring waist. Fake fly, side pockets, a back pocket, and elasticated hems.
Short shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, back pockets and short slits in the hems.
Short, gently fitted dungaree dress in stretch denim with buttons down the front, wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a seam at the waist with patch pockets. Unlined.

Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and long balloon sleeves with elastication and a flounced trim at the cuffs. Flounced trim around the neckline and down the front.
Trousers in a patterned viscose weave with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and wide, gently flared legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft, ribbed cotton with contrasting colour flatlock seams.

Fully lined balconette bikini top with decorative draping at the front. Moulded, padded cups that lift and shape the bust, wide, adjustable, detachable shoulder straps that can be fastened in various ways, and a wide metal fastener at the back.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing glittery threads with a decorative bow at the hem.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Wide waist belt in sturdy leather with a large, covered buckle and large metal eyelets. Bonded inside.

Full-length, V-neck dress in heavily draping jersey with a slight sheen. Long shoulder straps that can be tied in various ways, elastication at the back of the waist and a raw-edge hem. Jersey lining.

Set with a short-sleeved bodysuit, T-shirt and pair of leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Wrapover bodysuit with short sleeves and press-studs at one side and the crotch. T-shirt with press-studs at the shoulders. Leggings with full feet, elastication at the heels and a foldover waist.
Loafers in imitation suede made partly from recycled polyester. Linings and insoles in a cotton weave and patterned soles.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset,wide sides and string back.
Fitted cami top in microfibre with lightly padded cups, a v-shaped neckline with a lace trim and narrow adjustable shoulder straps.

Calf-length dress in twill with a seam at the waist and press-studs at the sides. Adjustable shoulder straps with metal D-rings, and a two-part chest pocket, one side with a flap and press-stud. Unlined.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Wide metal bangles in different designs.
Vest tops in stretch cotton jersey. Regular Fit.

Shirt in an airy weave made from a cotton blend with a turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Kaftan in an airy cotton and silk weave with a deep V-neck.

Calf-length dress in a patterned weave with an opening at the front and ties at the top. Short, elasticated sleeves, flounces at the front, a concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt.
Wide top in soft, printed jersey with short, wide dolman sleeves and a rounded hem.
Blouse in an airy weave with a small stand-up collar, frills and concealed buttons at the front, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Cap in woven fabric with a contrasting colour peak, appliqué on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Sleeveless dress in brocade with a glittery-thread pattern. Concealed zip at the back, gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt reinforced with two layers of tulle. Lined.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.

Padded ski jacket in windproof, water-repellent breathable functional fabric with closed seams at critical points, a lined hood with a peak and elastic drawstring, and a zip down the front. Side pockets, a chest pocket, zipped lift pass pocket and two inner pockets, one with a zip and the other in mesh. Snow flap with reinforced elastication and press-studs at the waist, an adjustable hook and loop tab at the cuffs, and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Imitation leather card holder with a zipped compartment and four card slots on the back. Size 7x12.5 cm.

Maxi dress in soft jersey with a V-neck at the front and low-cut neckline at the back. Wide shoulder straps that cross at the back, an elasticated seam at the waist and a long, pleated, heavily draping skirt. Lined.
